11/17/15 03:32 PM EST
Ted Cruz continued his collection of endorsements Tuesday with prominent conservative activist Virginia “Ginni" Thomas.
“I am looking for the kind of person who will be the leader of the free world,” Thomas said in an endorsement video. “Someone who has a North Star; someone who is a principled, experienced conservative. And Ted Cruz has got the scars to show he has tangled with the top Republican leaders and Democrats leaders in town…Rhetoric and promise on the campaign trail are not enough.”
Story Continued Below
Thomas’ husband is conservative Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas.
“What’s great about Ted Cruz is we don’t have on the job training problems," she says. 
Thomas’ endorsement follows Iowa hardliner Steve King’s announcement of support on Monday.
